I have developed a new all encompasing forum with the assistance of
Kryo, w=
ho you'll see there. It is the Samurai Archives Citadel- 3
"locations" span=
ning 13 different Japanese history and culture related
forums rolled into o=
ne giant community:

http://samurai.threespursdesign.com/index.php

Here ar=
e a few of the locations within the Citadel:

The Genkan: The first stop fo=
r new people joining the group, with info
on how the forum works, and where=
 you can ask technical forum
questions, "how to..." etc.

Samurai History: =
Basically, what we have here.

Ancient Japan: A forum for discussion of Jap=
anese history through the
Heian period - Hosted by Nagaeyari.

Arms and Arm=
or: A forum for the discussion of arms and armor of the
Samurai - Hosted by=
 Tony.

Japanese Language: A forum for all questions and things related to =
the
Japanese language - Also hosted by Tony.

The Bakumatsu: The latest par=
t of the Tokugawa era, the Bakumatsu
period is one of the most agitated and=
 romanticized part of Japanese
history. It is the age of the last samurai, =
of intense fighting
between the pro-emperor ishin shishi from Satsuma and C=
hoshu and the
pro-shogunate Shinsengumi troops.

Japanese Entertainment: A =
forum for all Japanese entertainment, music,
drama, movies, and anime.

The=
re are also various goodies like Avatars and ranks based the number
of post=
s a person makes, and as forum Shogun, I can also bestow titles
upon member=
s at will.  The forum is brand new, so there are still many
things that wil=
l be added and changed, but I invite everyone here to
go join up and see wh=
at is there.

This yahoo group will continue to exist, as I know some peopl=
e like to
be able to get and send emails, because it is easier than checkin=
g
websites, particularly at work. But definately go ahead and sign up at
th=
e Samurai Archives Citadel - it will eventually become the main
point of co=
ntact for all people interested in various aspects of Japan.
